title: Carlos Counts Kittens
subtle: Concept (fiction), 33 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR50L, Fiction Series
description: How many kittens will Carlos count? Carlos gets one kitten after another. Soon the whole couch is full of kittens. What will Carlos do with all those kittens? Students have an opportunity to determine the problem and think of solutions as they read.
meta: five, four, kittens, many, one, seven, six, three, two
Use the reading strategy of asking and answering questions
Problem and Solution : Identify the problem and solution in a story
Exclamation Marks : Recognize and use exclamation marks
Number Words : Practice using number words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
